text: The Hyundai Alcazar is a compact Crossover SUV that has three row seating made by Hyundai since 2021. == History and Features == The Hyundai Alcazar was revealed in April 2021. and was launched in June of the same year. its based on the Hyundai Creta but its longer with three row seating with options of six and seven seats. it has a 1.5 turbocharged and 2.0 petrol engine and a 1.5 diesel engine and it has a 6-speed manual and automatic transmission and a 7-speed DCT transmission it had a minor facelift in 2023 followed by a facelift in September 2024. == Markets == The Hyundai Alcazar is sold mainly in India its also sold as the Hyundai Creta Grand in Mexico also in South Africa the car is sold as the Hyundai Grand Creta and the Alcazar is sold in Dominican Republic as the Hyundai Cantus Lux. == References == Alcazar Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sport utility vehicles
title: Hyundai Alcazar
